item.description:
Doors open at 8:00 AM and we want to be there then so we can save seats in the non-smoking room. You can meet us directly at Foxwoods, or for those who would like to carpool, meet at the commuter parking lot at Exit 16 from Route 2 in Colchester. Be there between 7:00 and 7:15 as the carpool will leave promptly at 7:15.

We'll buy our bingo cards -- $25 for 20 games -- and reserve our places. Then we'll head to the buffet breakfast for $10 as the bingo does not actually start until 10:30. Expect to be there until mid-afternoon.
item.how_to_find_us: Don and Sharon are our hosts and even have extra daubers!
item.name: BINGO!
